Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>


* Zyber walked out of Rowdy's cave, she wasn't going to get in the middle of a battle that was over nothing more then race! It was down right STUPID! Or so she thought, she had been alone for so long that perhaps she had lost her taste for strange company.
She almost seemed to feel crowded with just Rowdy Wolf and Striker there, but she couldn't just leave. She knew that if a battle did break out then she would be left to pick up the pieces, even if it meant picking up the pieces of a damaged bot.
Zyber shook her head as she came across a small stream, she bent down and began to wash the bowl with a sigh.
It seemed that sometimes life just wasn't fair to some.
Her snow white fur fluttered about her face as a slight wind came up, so unfair.*

____________________________________________

* Iron Raptor had caught that Prowl had gotten the meaning of her look, but she also caught something else when his eyes met hers.
She shrugged, or maybe it was her imagination?
Whatever cause, it could wait. It was not time to get out of there so that they didn't end up fighting for their lives just because they were in the wrong place at the wrong time.
Iron Raptor nodded and turned ever so carefully to follow Prowl away from the battle, there was just some fights that a bot had to stay out of. This was one of them!
She came up beside of Prowl, the trees around them were close together and barely wide enough for one bot to pass in between.
Iron Raptor swerved to avoid smacking into an upcoming tree and brushed against Prowl's shoulder, she passed the tree and continued on.*

" Sorry."

* She whispered for the accidental brush, expecting Prowl to say something about it before her that meant his dislike.
Iron Raptor looked about the forest, it was quite dank and dark...not too different from the forests back on her home planet, Sirose.*
